episode: I am grateful for what I have and my family.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am grateful for what I have and my family.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's wonderful to hear! Cherishing family is so important.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it is, as I grow older I find family to be more important

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, they truly are a treasure.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Especially seeing my parents getting close to the end of their lives

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That can be tough. Cherish the time you have with them.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes that is what I am trying to do

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is sad but I want them to live a happy rest of their lives

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a wonderful goal.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Life is tough but I am very grateful for what I have

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: You bet. Plus I get to see my nephews starting their own families

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's heartwarming!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I feel very grateful for this

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's beautiful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes it is. I am also very grateful for my health

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's important!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: As I grow older health is the most important

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely.
